contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Xyliphius'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Actinopterygii]] | ordo = [[Catfish|Siluriformes]] | familia = [[Aspredinidae]] | subfamilia = [[Hoplomyzontinae]] | genus = '''''Xyliphius''''' | genus_authority = [[Carl H. Eigenmann|C. H. Eigenmann]], 1912 | type_species = ''Xyliphius magdalenae'' | type_species_authority = C. H. Eigenmann, 1912 | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = }} '''''Xyliphius''''' is a [[genus]] of [[banjo catfish]]es from [[South America]] This genus appears to be widespread in the [[Magdalena River|Magdalena]], [[Orinoco]], [[Amazon River|Amazon]], and [[Paraguay River|Paraguay]]-[[Paraná River]] systems where they are most common in deeper waters.<ref name="Friel1994">{{cite journal|url=http://www.cumv.cornell.edu/pdf/Friel_Ph.D._Thesis_1994.pdf|title=A Phylogenetic Study of the Neotropical Banjo Catfishes (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Aspredinidae)|author=Friel, John Patrick|publisher=Duke University, Durham, NC|date=1994-12-13|accessdate=2007-08-07|format=[[PDF]]}}</ref> ''Xyliphius'' includes moderately sized aspredinids, ranging from 8.8–14.7 [[centimetre]]s (3.5–5.8 [[inch|in]]) [[fish measurement|SL]].<ref name="Friel1994"/> Species of this genus are distinguished from all other aspredinids by having highly reduced [[eye]]s, toothless [[premaxilla]]e, a row of fleshy [[Papilla (fish mouth structure)|papilla]]e projecting anteriorly off the lower lip, flattened unculi and unculiferous [[tubercle]]s flattened. These species also have the openings of the anterior nares with papillae and no dark saddles on the body.<ref name="Friel1994"/> ==Species== There are currently seven described species in this genus:<ref>{{FishBase genus | genus = Xyliphius| month = December | year = 2011}}</ref> * ''[[Xyliphius anachoretes]]'' <small>[[Carlos August Assumpҫão de Figueiredo|C. A. A. de Figueiredo]] & [[Marcelo Ribeiro de Britto|Britto]], 2010</small> * ''[[Xyliphius barbatus]]'' <small>[[Armonía Socorro Alonso de Arámburu|Alonso de Arámburu]] & [[Raúl Horacio Arámburu|Arámburu]], 1962</small> * ''[[Xyliphius kryptos]]'' <small>[[Donald Charles Taphorn Baechle|Taphorn]] & [[Craig Gustav Lilyestrom|Lilyestrom]], 1983</small> * ''[[Xyliphius lepturus]]'' <small>[[Gustavo Edmundo Orcés-Villagómez|Orcés-V.]] ([[:es:Gustavo Orcés|es]]), 1962</small> * ''[[Xyliphius lombarderoi]]'' <small>[[Francisco Juan José Risso Ceriani|F. J. J. Risso]] & [[Edith Nelly Pianta de Risso|E. N. P. de Risso]], 1964</small> * ''[[Xyliphius magdalenae]]'' <small>[[Carl H. Eigenmann|C. H. Eigenmann]], 1912</small> * ''[[Xyliphius melanopterus]]'' <small>[[Gustavo Edmundo Orcés-Villagómez|Orcés-V.]] ([[:es:Gustavo Orcés|es]]), 1962</small> ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Aspredinidae]] [[Category:Fish of South America]] [[Category:Fauna of the Amazon]] [[Category:Fish of Argentina]] [[Category:Fauna of Colombia]] [[Category:Fauna of Ecuador]] [[Category:Fauna of Venezuela]] {{catfish-stub}}
